name: rpmsubg

cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ℝ+ ∈(SubGrp ` c0)
⊣ c0 =((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s](ℂ \ { 0 }))
⊣ 1 ∈ ℝ+
⊣ (hs0 ∈ ℝ+ →(1[÷]hs0)∈ ℝ+)
⊣ d(hs0, hs1)
⊣ d(hs0, ℝ+)
⊣ d(hs0, c0)
⊣ d(hs1, ℝ+)
⊣ d(hs1, c0)

comment: The positive reals form a multiplicative subgroup of the complex numbers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Jun-2015.)
